    • registerProduct

      public void registerProduct​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, double price, java.lang.String nit) throws exceptions.NotFoundRestaurantException, exceptions.DuplicateProductException
      It registers a product
      Parameters:
      id - The id
      name - The name
      description - The description
      price - The price
      nit - The NIT of the restaurant that offers this product
      Throws:
      exceptions.NotFoundRestaurantException - If there is no restaurant with the NIT entered
      exceptions.DuplicateProductException - If there is a product already registered with the id entered

    • searchClientByName

      public java.lang.String searchClientByName​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String lastName)
      It searches a client by his name
      Parameters:
      name - The name
      lastName - The last name
      Returns:
      If the client was found, so the client is returned. If it was not, so a message informing what happened is returned. In both cases the time spent in the search is returned
